ValidationRule.description: Require the fields Interest Disbursement Account ID and Interest Disbursement Account Types when Disposition of Interest is set to Deposit to Account.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( ISCHANGED(JHJX__IntDisp__c), TEXT(JHJX__IntDisp__c)= 'DepToAcct', OR( ISBLANK(JHJX__IntDispAcctId__c), ISBLANK(TEXT(JHJX__IntDispAcctType__c)) ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: The fields Interest Disbursement Account ID and Interest Disbursement Account Types must be populated.
